member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Int16,System.Decimal,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates the record.
member.param: The first name of the record.
The last name of the record.
The date of birth of the record.
The favourite symbol of the record.
member.exception: Thrown when parameters do not meet the requirements: firstname and lastname length should be in range [2;60], contain not only space symbols, dateofbirth should be in range [01.01.1950;DateTime.Now], grade should be in range [-10;10], height should be in range [0,3m;3m], favouritesymbol can't be a space symbol.
Thrown when firstname or lastname is null.
member.returns: The id of the created record.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets all the records.
member.returns: The list of all current records.

member.summary: Finds the records by the firstname.
member.param: The first name to find the records by it.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the records by the last name.
member.param: The last name to find the records by it.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the records by the date of birth.
member.param: The date of birth to find the records by it.
